```{r, echo=F}
# CREATE DATAFRAME AND WRANGLE DATA 
ballet.df <- data.frame(ballet, composer, choreographer_1, choreographer_2, acts, month_premiered, day_premiered, year_premiered)
ballet.df <- ballet.df %>% 
  select(ballet, composer, choreographer_1, choreographer_2, acts) %>%
  mutate(date_premiered = make_date(year_premiered, month_premiered, day_premiered))
```

```{r}
ballet.df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x= date_premiered, y = ballet)) +
  geom_point()
```
